channel.title: I need help form someone experienced with "Compiling" and/or "JDK" . PLEASE
channel.description:
Okay, I have tried numerous things to try get my client running, I have followed advice fomr amny people and spent 14 hours tryin to figure this out. When I try to compile;
IT says; Note: Some input files override a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint : deprecation for details.
How do I do that??
Also is there a command I can add to make my compiler find the JDK v6 update16 in my files? If so, where do I add it in aswell?
If someone has JDK V6 Update 16 , can you please send me what your "CLASSPATH" and "Path" are set to? Also could I please have a copy of your compiler to try please?
Thanks,
I will be greatful for any Information on the matter :)

item.title: I need help form someone experienced with "Compiling" and/or "JDK" . PLEASE
item.dc:creator: @Babula7 Babula7
item.description:
@Babula7 wrote:

Thanks heaps guys

I am about to try it, Im just ifnding a new lcient mine wasnt complete :O[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 27, 2009, 11:46:26 pm[/size][hr]okay, How do I get a Server.Class?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 28, 2009, 12:02:03 am[/size][hr]OMG, When I run Client now It says; " ‘java’ is not recognised as an internal or external command. " what do i do now? And i sitll need to know how to get server.class if anyone knows . thanks

Read full topic
item.source: I need help form someone experienced with "Compiling" and/or "JDK" . PLEASE

item.title: I need help form someone experienced with "Compiling" and/or "JDK" . PLEASE
item.dc:creator: @holidayscape holidayscape
item.description:
@holidayscape wrote:

also to find the jdk V6 Update 6, right click compiler and click edit
then where it says jdk1.6.0_## (## can be any number)
change the ## to 16.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help form someone experienced with "Compiling" and/or "JDK" . PLEASE

Note: Recompile with -Xlint : deprecation for details.

Means It Worked Nothing To Worry About =)

Okay, I have tried numerous things to try get my client running, I have followed advice fomr amny people and spent 14 hours tryin to figure this out. When I try to compile;
